issues.info: You may report issues you experience with this mod in the AvalancheIndex repository.

badge-profile.name: Badge On Profiles
badge-profile.description: Display member badges on the <cg>profile page</c>.

solo-cells.name: Solo Level Cells
solo-cells.description: Highlight level cells for <co>team members' solo levels</c>.

solo-layers.name: Solo Level Pages
solo-layers.description: Customize level pages for <co>team members' solo levels</c>.

event-cells.name: Event Level Cells
event-cells.description: Highlight level cells for <co>levels that won in team events</c>.

event-layers.name: Event Level Pages
event-layers.description: Customize level pages for <co>levels that won in team events</c>.

view-changelog.name: Changelog Alert
view-changelog.description: Display a pop-up with a button to show the changelog when the mod updates.

show-aval-featured.name: Featured Project Button
show-aval-featured.description: Display a button in the main menu that shows the featured <cl>Avalanche</c> <cy>team project</c>.

show-proj-info.name: Project Information Button
show-proj-info.description: Display a button in a project's level information page and in-game pause menu that opens a pop-up detailing additional information about it.

show-fame.name: Famed Projects
show-fame.description: Highlight levels that are featured in <cl>Avalanche</c>'s hall of fame.

classic-only.name: Only Classic Levels
classic-only.description: Display highlight color exclusively on <cg>classic</c> <cy>solo levels</c>.

err-notifs.name: Web Error Notifications
err-notifs.description: Display a notification when the badge web request fails.

colors.name: Comment Colors
colors.description: Set the colors that text from comments posted by <cl>Avalanche</c> officials will be recolored to. <cr>This ignores level publishers.</c>

comments.name: Comment Text Colors
comments.description: Recolor text on team members' comments.

com-director.name: Director Color
com-director.description: Customize the comment color for the <cy>director</c>.

com-manager.name: Manager Color
com-manager.description: Customize the comment color for the <cy>managers</c>.

com-member.name: Member Color
com-member.description: Customize the comment color for the <cy>members</c>.

com-collaborator.name: Collaborator Color
com-collaborator.description: Customize the comment color for the <cy>collaborators</c>.

com-cubic.name: Cubic Studios Color
com-cubic.description: Customize the comment color for <cj>Cubic Studios</c> <cy>staff</c>.

web-once.name: Fetch Data Once
web-once.description: Only send one web request per game session to get all <cl>Avalanche</c> data.

check-aval.name: Quicker Project Update
check-aval.description: Ping the server more often to check for a new featured <cl>Avalanche</c> <cy>team project</c>. <cr>This will still depend on user input and is not live.</c>
check-aval.enable-if-description: The Featured Project button must be enabled.
